School (district) : Potlatch Elementary School (Potlatch School District)
Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);
LinkedIn Profile : I enjoy being in nature and going on hikes.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* This would be a great opportunity for me to learn skills from a company using STEM, and bring those skills back to share with my students. It would also provide real-world examples of how the skills that are being learned can be applied to future career paths for my students.
